data.displayName: Flow Business - Single Rate with CL

fees.description: Fee may apply when your property is disconnected (including when you move), and is passed through from your distributor. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee as they may vary.

Fee may apply when your property is reconnected (including when you move), and is passed through from your distributor. Please visit your distributor's website to find out the current fee as they may vary.
A 0.66% fee (GST Incl) may apply to payments made by Mastercard or Visa credit cards.

electricityContract.terms: See Flow Power Market Retail Contract Agreement Terms at flowpower.com.au/residential/policies/small-business-agreement-terms
electricityContract.variation: Usage and solar feed-in tariff rates are not fixed. For more information about our pricing visit flowpower.com.au/residential/pricing/our-pricing/ or flowpower.com.au/residential/pricing/our-feed-in-tariff/

incentives.description: Battery Customers Only - $150 (Incl. GST) Sign-Up Credit
incentives.displayName: Battery Customers Only - $150 (Incl. GST) Sign-Up Credit
incentives.eligibility: A one-time $150 (Incl. GST) sign-up credit will be applied as $50 across the first three electricity bills. Any unused credit will roll over to the next bill. This credit is non-refundable, non-transferable, and cannot be redeemed for cash.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Ongoing with no fixed term. No lock in contract or exit fees.
